meanings.definition: Filled with or expressing great joy or triumph.
meanings.sent1: The team was exultant after winning the championship game.
meanings.sent2: She felt exultant when she received the award for her hard work.
meanings.sent3: The exultant puppy wagged its tail happily as it played with its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The exultant flowers bloomed brightly under the warm sun.
meanings.sent5: The exultant child's laughter filled the room with pure happiness.

meanings.definition: Feeling or showing great happiness and excitement.
meanings.sent1: The exultant students cheered loudly at the surprise party thrown for their teacher.
meanings.sent2: He was exultant when he found out he got accepted into his dream college.
meanings.sent3: The exultant squirrel chattered excitedly as it found a stash of nuts.
meanings.sent4: The exultant waves crashed against the shore, creating a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: Her exultant smile lit up the room with pure joy.
